name: Electrek.co
author: Fred Lambert
title: Tesla’s battery research group files new patent that could help prevent cell failure
description: Tesla’s battery research group in Canada has filed a new patent application for a way to analyze an electrolyte in a lithium cell, which could help prevent cell failure. more… Subscribe to Electrek on YouTube for exclusive videos and subscribe to the podcast.…
content:
Tesla’s battery research group in Canada has filed a new patent application for a way to analyze an electrolyte in a lithium cell, which could help prevent cell failure.
The patent was filed through Tesla’s battery research group led by Jeff Dahn in Halifax.… [+4332 chars]

title: Beyond Meat has hit the ‘short-squeeze trifecta’ as borrow fees keep soaring
description: Beyond Meat Inc. is now the most expensive stock to borrow among active short targets, as lending fees continue to skyrocket.
content:
Beyond Meat Inc. is now the most expensive stock to borrow among active short targets, as lending fees continue to skyrocket.
